external_references.source_name: Joint Cybersecurity Advisory AA23-129A Snake Malware May 2023
external_references.description: FBI et al. (2023, May 9). Hunting Russian Intelligence “Snake” Malware. Retrieved June 8, 2023.

objects.description: [Uroburos](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0022) can query the Registry, typically `HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Classes\.wav\OpenWithProgIds`, to find the key and path to decrypt and load its kernel driver and kernel driver loader.(Citation: Joint Cybersecurity Advisory AA23-129A Snake Malware May 2023)
